availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David N. Walden (Henderson County, Kentucky, constable and surveyor)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, sheriff, constable, and surveyor. Henderson County native. Married Martha A. Wheatley Walden on October 4, 1852. Father of Josephine Walden. Constable in Henderson County in 1850. Surveyor in Henderson County in 1860. Sheriff of Henderson County from 1863 to 64.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District 1, p. 288; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, p. 8; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Henderson, Ward 1, p. 5; Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Ancestry, Marriages, Henderson County, Kentucky, October 4, 1852. "An Act for the benefit of D. N. Walden, Sheriff of Henderson County," Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, 1863-64 (Frankfort, Ky.: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1865), 455. Edmund L. Starling, History of Henderson County, Kentucky (Henderson, Kentucky: The Lewis Publishing Company, 1887), 823.
